What's New in DockFlow 1.17

Key Improvements & Bug Fixes

  • Hotkeys Stability: Resolved an issue where renaming presets or changing their hotkeys could lead to "shadow hotkeys" â€“ shortcuts that remained active even after being removed or reassigned. This fix ensures more reliable and predictable hotkey behavior.
  • Menu Bar Icon Customization: Added a new "White Logo" option for the menu bar icon, allowing for better visibility and personalization, especially with darker menu bar themes.
  • Overall Stability: Implemented various under-the-hood improvements for enhanced app stability and more consistent behavior across all features.
